short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Open a synced mobile view of the current tab in a new window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is an extention for everybody who creates web content. We all do this on desktop, but most of our users are on mobile. To make it easier to keep an eye on the mobile result, this extention creates a new, mobile-sized windows that is continously synced to the original, desktop-size tab. When you scroll or click in one tab, the other is updated. The mobile view is displayed using a Iphone 14-user agent string. This can be changed under Settings.
